general.name: Name
about.text1: Hi there! We're Austin and Rachel, the makers of FreeRoam. Austin programs and Rachel designs. We're living in a 1987 Alpenlite fith wheel with our dog, Topher.
about.text2: Our goal with FreeRoam is to build the ultimate resource for RVers. We're starting by helping people choose the right products for their RVs, but plan on expanding to more helpful resources.
about.text3: We are not in this to get rich. We hope that this can one day support our costs, but past that we intend to direct any additional revenue toward the community.
about.text4: All of the code for FreeRoam is Open-Source, which means anyone can read through the underlying code that makes up the app
about.text5: We're doing this to be as transparent as possible. We live in a time where tech companies do some pretty shady things to make more money, and we want to be the embody opposite of that.
app.defaultInstallMessage: Add FreeRoam to your homescreen to quickly access all features anytime
app.stillLoading: We're still loading this page. If this message remains for more than a few seconds, send us an email with the version of Android you're using: austin@freeroam.app
installOverlay.title: Add FreeRoam to homescreen
installOverlay.instructions: Select 'Add to homescreen' to pin the FreeRoam web app
